languages.text: [Холодно отвернуться от Кляйна] "Видимо, доблесть ветерана была преувеличена. Вам надо хорошенько отдохнуть. Пусть его подменит Хротко".
[Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."
languages.original_text: [Холодно отвернуться от Кляйна] "Видимо, доблесть ветерана была преувеличена. Вам надо хорошенько отдохнуть. Пусть его подменит Хротко".

traits.locale_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko do his duties for him."
[Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko do his duties for him."
[Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

[Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."
[Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

languages.text: [Vous détourner de Klein] « Apparemment, j'ai surestimé le courage de ce vétéran. Il a besoin de repos. Hrotko se chargera de le remplacer. »
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

traits.locale_text: [Vous détourner de Klein] « Apparemment, j'ai surestimé le courage de ce vétéran. Il a besoin de repos. Hrotko se chargera de le remplacer. »

languages.text: [Dar la espalda a Klein] «Parece que he sobrestimado el coraje de este veterano. Debería descansar. Que Hrotko le releve».
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

traits.locale_text: [Dar la espalda a Klein] «Parece que he sobrestimado el coraje de este veterano. Debería descansar. Que Hrotko le releve».

languages.text: [转过身，背对克莱因]“大家都说这位老兵勇气可嘉，我看是夸大其辞。他应该休息休息了，让赫洛卡来接替他的工作吧。”
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

traits.locale_text: [转过身，背对克莱因]“大家都说这位老兵勇气可嘉，我看是夸大其辞。他应该休息休息了，让赫洛卡来接替他的工作吧。”

languages.text: [クラインに背を向ける]「このベテランの勇気を、過剰評価していたようだ。彼はもう少し休むべきだ。フロトコに彼の職務を引き継がせよう」
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

traits.locale_text: [クラインに背を向ける]「このベテランの勇気を、過剰評価していたようだ。彼はもう少し休むべきだ。フロトコに彼の職務を引き継がせよう」

languages.text: [Dich von Klein abwenden] "Ich habe den Mut dieses Veteranen wohl überschätzt. Er sollte sich ein wenig ausruhen. Hrotko soll seine Pflichten übernehmen."
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."

traits.locale_text: [Dich von Klein abwenden] "Ich habe den Mut dieses Veteranen wohl überschätzt. Er sollte sich ein wenig ausruhen. Hrotko soll seine Pflichten übernehmen."

languages.text: [Klein'dan bakışlarını çevir] "Bu kıdemli subayın cesareti hususundaki görüşüm galiba abartıya kaçmış. Biraz dinlense iyi olacak. Vazifelerini Hrotko devralsın."
languages.original_text: [Turn away from Klein] "It would seem that I had an exaggerated opinion of this veteran's courage. He should get some rest. Let Hrotko take over his duties."
